  "bounds": [800, 600],

      "name": "LayoutView #document",

      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [

          "bounds": [300, 300],
          "drawsContent": true,
          "children": [
            {
              "name": "Child Containment Layer",
              "bounds": [300, 300],
              "children": [
                {
                  "name": "Ancestor Clipping Layer",
                  "bounds": [285, 300],
                  "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "name": "LayoutBlockFlow DIV id='content'",
                      "bounds": [285, 1000],
                      "drawsContent": true
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
